data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
The module calculates the volume of rotational bodies. These are
    bodies resulting from the rotation of a portion of a 2D function
    around an axis.

    I am not aware of a module with that functionality and the
    mathematics, while not groundbreaking, aren't completely trivial.
    Particularily not for a computer.

    The module uses Math::Integral::Romberg for integration and
    Math::Symbolic for function representation and derivatives.
